00032 struct comedi_context {
00033 
00034         /* This field is redundant with the following parameters;
00035            setting it at the head of the structure may save 
00036            useless operations */
00037         struct comedi_device *dev;
00038         rtdm_user_info_t *rtdm_usrinf;
00039         struct rtdm_dev_context *rtdm_cxt;

00041 typedef struct comedi_context comedi_cxt_t;

00049         (x)->dev = NULL;                                \
